articles.title: Kelsey Grammer becomes a dad again at 70
articles.content: Kelsey Grammer has welcomed his eighth child and fourth baby with wife Kayte Walsh. The new addition is a son named Christopher. "It was like three days ago," he said. "Christopher, that's just joined the family.". Grammer and Walsh already share three children together, a 12-year-old daughter, and two sons aged 10 and eight. In June, news broke that Grammer and Walsh were expecting. The actor was photographed in London, England, with his pregnant wife as they strolled through a park together. In May, the Cheers alum opened up about being a father to seven in...
